abstract: North Carolina General Assembly plans to hold special session to consider blocking measure approved by officials in Charlotte, NC, that would forbid discrimination in public accommodations towards gay and transgender people.
lead_paragraph: The General Assembly will hold a special session to consider blocking a city ordinance that would broaden protections for gay and transgender people.

headline.main: North Carolina: State to Consider Blocking Charlotte Anti-Bias Law
headline.print_headline: North Carolina: State to Consider Blocking Charlotte Anti-Bias Law

snippet: The General Assembly will hold a special session to consider blocking a city ordinance that would broaden protections for gay and transgender people.
